settings.heading: Build Something You Believe In
settings.title: Build Something You Believe In: A Powerhouse Partnership Between HyperX & OMEN and 2K Games for Civilization VII
settings.description_col_1: Welcome to your future in gaming, where technology and strategy collide. HyperX and OMEN have formed a partnership with 2K Games to bring you an unparalleled experience in the much-anticipated Civilization VII. From seasoned strategists to those embarking on their first journey through history, this collaboration empowers you to play like never before with cutting-edge hardware and game-enhancing innovations.

settings.heading: Sharper Tactics, Greater Power
settings.title: Sharper Tactics, Greater Power
settings.description_col_1:
HyperX:

Known for high-performance gaming peripherals, including headphones, keyboards, and mice, HyperX gives you the precision, speed, and comfort needed to conquer the world. Immerse yourself inGwendoline Christie’s narration with crystal-clear audio while you carve into the earth’s strata with swift keystrokesand controlled clicks, all designed to enhance your Civilization VII experience.
settings.description_col_2:
OMEN by HP:

With top-tier gaming laptops and desktops, OMEN delivers the power and visual fidelity that makes Civilization VII's vast, intricate world come alive. From managing a sprawling empire to waging intense diplomatic battles, OMEN ensures smooth, lag-free performance from the very first hex to your final victory.

settings.heading_text: Experience the Future of Strategy Gaming
settings.desc: This collaboration ensures you’re fully equipped to execute your strategies with exceptional precision while enjoying flawless gameplay throughout each era of history. HyperX’s expertly crafted peripherals, paired with OMEN’s high-performance systems, work together to deliver a Civilization VII experience like no other. Be it building flourishing civilizations or mastering complex diplomacy, ever move you make will be met with seamless responsiveness, putting the power of strategy in your hands.

When your strategy depends on the finest details, don’t settle for less. Gear up with the performance and technology you deserve and lead your civilization to greatness in Civilization VII. With HyperX and OMEN at your side, victory is within your grasp.

Claim your legacy in Civilization VII with two exclusive in-game banners, inspired by the power of ancient kingdoms and modern empires. Get them free when you purchase a HyperX gaming keyboard, mouse or select bundle!

settings.title: Explore Gear Options for Your Empire:
settings.subtitle: Whether you’re leading your armies to glory, navigating the diplomacy of a golden age, or expanding your borders to the ends of the world in Civilization VII, HyperX and OMEN have the tools to ensure you remain in control.
